channel.title: Connecting to VPN client running on Host
channel.description:
I have a openvpn client running on Win 10 os, it is connected to a remote openvpn server via proxy(Tor). Now in the guest os (Whonix Workstation) I want to connect a voip client to the openvpn client.
The openvpn client runs on ip address of 10.8.x.x Whonix workstation 10.152.x.x
The reason I'm running openvpn in the first place is to tunnel SIP traffic which is UDP over tcp.
Is there a way where the SIP client running in Whonix can see the open vpn client on the host.
Do i need configure the firewall for this?

item.title: Connecting to VPN client running on Host
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Welcome to Whonix forums and thank you for your question!

WhosWho:

Win 10 os

Whonix – 1 Mar 21

Microsoft Windows Hosts

Microsoft Windows as Malware, Windows Insecurity, Windows Backdoors and User Freedoms, Windows Sabotage, Windows Interference, Windows Surveillance, Other Windows Abuses, Inescapable Telemetry

WhosWho:

openvpn

Whonix – 19 Jun 20

Combining Tunnels with Tor

Information on whether Tor gets more or less secure when combining Tor with tunnels such as VPN, SSH, proxies. (User → Tor → proxy/VPN/SSH → Internet) (User → proxy/VPN/SSH → Tor → Internet)

WhosWho:

Is there a way where the SIP client running in Whonix can see the open vpn client on the host.

No. Unsupported.

Whonix – 19 Jun 20

Undocumented / Untested / Unsupported

This feature is either undocumented, untested, or unsupported. Options: Become Contributor / Apply Free Support Principle / Purchase Professional Support.

That would be non-anonymous.

By design, any traffic originating from inside Whonix-Workstation must not be able to directly interact with software on the host operating system.

For connection scheme
User → Tor → VPN → Internet
the VPN software should be installed inside Whonix-Workstation.

WhosWho:

UDP

Whonix – 27 Sep 20

Tunnel UDP over Tor - Whonix

Workaround for Tunneling UDP over Tor. Connection Scheme: User → Tor → Destination

WhosWho:

SIP client

Maybe some alternative here:

Whonix – 10 Dec 20

Voice over IP (VoIP)

Anonymous Voice over IP (VoIP). Encrypted, anonymous phone calls using the Tor Anonymity Network.

Read full topic
item.source: Connecting to VPN client running on Host
